Laboratory: Please construct a laboratory to create Potions

Bedrooms: Some nice warm beds, perfect for some relaxation between missions and building pillow forts.
Docks: When in a harbor town, might as well have docks. Allows you to own water vehicles.
Kitchen: An estate is only as good as its kitchen. Fulfill your culinary dreams on this hearth. (Allows to create rations and supplies food at cheaper cost during downtime).
Laboratory: A basic labratory allowing you to brew simple potions. (Potions of Healing, Climbing and Comprehension).
Pen: The pen allows you to give pets you may find or buy on your travels to roam freely. Also generates income and takes away the cost of ration production.
Prison: On your adventures you might take prisoners. You can't hold them indefinitely, but before you bring them to the authority you might ask them some questions, to potentially unlock special quests.
Scriptorium: This basic study room allows you to create spell scrolls for spells up to level 3.
Smithy: A basic smithy to create simple weapons and armor
Stable: While Asura Portals allow for travel to big cities, a lot of Tyria still has to be traveled the old fashioned way. Stables allow the possession of mounts.

Laboratory: A good quality labratory, allowing you to brew stronger potions. (Potions of Greater Healing, Resistance, Poison and Waterbreathing)
Scriptorium: This higher quality study room allows you to create spell scrolls up to level 5.
Smithy: A good quality smithy, capable of producing higher tier weapons and armor (non-magical +1)

Laboratory: A high class labratory allowing you to brew the strongest potions. Beware, not for the weak! (Potion of Superior Healing, Clairvoyance, Dimunition, Strength, Gaseous Form, Heroism, Mind Reading).
Scriptorium: This top tier study room allows you to create spell scrolls up to level 7 and you can tweak existing spells like changing the damage type, range, cast time and so.
Smithy: A high class smithy, allowing you to forge metal that can easily be magically enhanced (magical +1 weapons and armor, simple enchantments on forged goods)
